name: Konrad the Rocket
description:
Our GLORIOUS NATION needs you! You will test the secret weapon that will guarantee our SUPERIORITY! The Project Rocket!

The tests aren't easy and we don't expect your survival, but that's how HEROES are born!



Play as Konrad, a humble worker that is being forced to test a secret weapon.Features:
  • Project Rocket: It is actually a jetpack
  • 75 levels
  • Original soundtrack
  • Inspired by George Orwell's 1984
  • 20 achievements
  • Made by one person
